entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect CS8170 when calling [UnscopedRef] method to assign to a fixed local #63529
  • Missing CS8166 when accessing [UnscopedRef] property to assing to an unscoped local #63526
  • Incorrect CS8166 when calling [UnscopedRef] method to assing to a scoped local #63524

Closed

  • Mark parameter from metadata with ScopedRefAttribute and UnscopedRefAttribute as invalid #63070
    17.4
  • Report error for `[UnscopedRef] scoped` parameter #63057
    17.4
  • Call to DeconstructionInfo.Nested causes System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'UncommonData' to type 'DeconstructionUncommonData'. #61332
    17.4
  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString misses `where T : default` constrains for overridden method #63512
    C# 12.0
  • Unclear which Recommender method is to be used #63521
  • GetTypeInfo doesn't work correctly on tuples #54437
    Compiler.Next
  • We might want to revisit SemanticModel behavior around type syntax for a DeclarationExpression based on ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #17462
    Compiler.Next
  • missing CS4014 warning when calling async func parameter #63436
  • False warning of property hiding inherited method member #63509
  • NullReferenceException from implicit cast of null-conditional member access expression #63516
  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString produces incorrect list of inherited generic classes #63511
  • source generator IncrementalValuesProvider caching lost on add/remove #63514
  • partial class source generator error #63513
  • Clarification on Supported use of RegisterForPostInitialization #63501

PullRequests

Created

  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Extract Base Record Pass 1 #63528
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the LSIF indexer's ability to load MSBuild projects and solutions #63527
    Area-IDE
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Add an Integration test to guard the case when rename UI could freeze #63520
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - fix tabstop location for cursor #63519
    Area-IDE
  • CSharp.DeclarationTable – avoid realizing lazy roots during add/remove operations. #63517
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Move symbol-cache incremental-analyzer out of oop. #63438
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle nested non-deconstruction conversions in DeconstructionInfo #63435
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Skip integration tests on PRs for compiler-only changes #63523
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not nominate project for restore #63518
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Constructor ordering, defaults, and overloads #63371
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Do symbol mapping in Go To Def #63439
    Area-IDE
  • Editorconfig valueholder #63483
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter out `RequiredMemberAttribute` from metadata symbols #63497
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Cherry-pick 62946 to 17.3 #63495
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid eagerly realizing the declaration table #59392
    Area-Compilers
